title: I still dont have the 10 year gift :((
body: :(( still dont have a the gift{{champion:32}}

replies.body: There are **millions** of players these gifts have to roll out to, so it will take a bit of time to ensure we get them out to everyone. As [the announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you) states, if you don't have the gifts by 9/23, please let me know.
excuse me but how do you know that you got the gifts ?
You should see a gift message with the item and recipient just like when you're gifted something from a friend or another player. ^.^

oh sorry to bother you but 1 more question I don't get it when it said if you don't get the 10 year gift item by 23 you spose to support I don't get it is it like if I don't get it i spose to ask you or something ?

If after the 23rd, you don't have the gift, let me know or submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). At that point, we can take a look at your account and figure out what happened.

I'm sorry to bother this much but this is the last one but what the mysteriest gift I mean I cant tell if I get the mysteries gift or not they say if you get kayle and her skins you can get the mysteries gift so what is it so I know that I have it ? and I do have kayle and her skin

We're still getting content out and the deadline is now the 30th for these. 

If you haven't yet, please read the [announcement on this event](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you) and let me know if you have any questions.
I got the skin but i didnt get the icon
